title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Build scalable backend services for our platform. Work with Python, Django, and PostgreSQL.
responsibilities: - Design and implement microservices, - Lead code reviews, - Mentor junior developers, - Participate in architecture decisions
requirements: - 8+ years of software engineering experience, - Strong Python/Django knowledge, - Experience with PostgreSQL, - Understanding of REST APIs, - AWS experience preferred
benefits: - Competitive salary, - Flexible remote work, - Professional development budget, - Comprehensive health benefits

title: Product Manager
description: Lead the strategy and vision for our core products. Work with engineering, design, and business teams.
responsibilities: - Define product roadmap, - Conduct user research, - Gather and prioritize requirements, - Work cross-functionally with teams, - Analyze metrics and drive improvements
requirements: - 5+ years as a Product Manager, - Experience with B2B SaaS products, - Data-driven decision making, - Strong communication skills, - MBA preferred but not required
benefits: - Competitive compensation, - Performance bonus, - Flexible work location, - Learning and development budget

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Build and maintain our cloud infrastructure. Ensure reliability and scalability of our services.
responsibilities: - Design CI/CD pipelines, - Manage Kubernetes clusters, - Implement monitoring and alerting, - Optimize cloud costs, - Document infrastructure as code
requirements: - 5+ years of DevOps experience, - Kubernetes expertise, - AWS or Google Cloud experience, - Infrastructure as Code (Terraform/Ansible), - Shell scripting skills
benefits: - Attractive salary package, - Sign-on bonus, - Relocation support available, - Continued learning opportunities

title: Frontend Developer
description: Create beautiful and performant user interfaces for our web platform.
responsibilities: - Develop React components, - Optimize frontend performance, - Implement responsive designs, - Write unit tests, - Collaborate with design team
requirements: - 4+ years of frontend development, - React and TypeScript expertise, - CSS/HTML proficiency, - Testing frameworks (Jest/React Testing Library), - Git proficiency
benefits: - Flexible schedule, - Remote work options, - Competitive salary, - Free training budget

title: Data Scientist
description: Build machine learning models to drive product insights and recommendations.
responsibilities: - Develop and train ML models, - Conduct data analysis, - Create data visualizations, - Implement recommendation systems, - Collaborate with product teams
requirements: - 5+ years in data science/ML, - Python proficiency, - Machine learning frameworks (scikit-learn, TensorFlow), - SQL for data querying, - Statistics and mathematics background
benefits: - Excellent compensation, - Research collaboration opportunities, - Conference attendance budget, - Remote work flexibility

title: UX/UI Designer
description: Design intuitive and beautiful user experiences for our applications.
responsibilities: - Create wireframes and prototypes, - Conduct user research, - Design visual components, - Collaborate with product and engineering teams, - Iterate based on user feedback
requirements: - 5+ years of UX/UI design experience, - Figma or Adobe XD expertise, - Understanding of user-centered design, - Portfolio demonstrating design work, - Basic prototyping skills
benefits: - Creative freedom, - Flexible work arrangement, - Design tools budget, - Professional development funding

title: Sales Executive
description: Drive revenue growth by managing enterprise client relationships and closing deals.
responsibilities: - Identify and qualify sales opportunities, - Manage full sales cycle, - Maintain client relationships, - Achieve sales targets, - Prepare proposals and presentations
requirements: - 5+ years in enterprise software sales, - Track record of exceeding quota, - Experience with SaaS products, - Strong negotiation skills, - CRM proficiency
benefits: - Competitive base salary, - Uncapped commission, - Car allowance, - Expense account

title: Marketing Manager
description: Lead marketing initiatives to drive brand awareness and customer acquisition.
responsibilities: - Develop marketing strategy, - Manage marketing campaigns, - Analyze marketing metrics, - Lead content creation, - Collaborate with sales and product
requirements: - 5+ years in B2B SaaS marketing, - Digital marketing expertise, - Marketing automation experience, - Analytics and data interpretation, - Budget management skills
benefits: - Competitive salary, - Performance bonus, - Marketing budget to manage, - Professional development
